output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, contains "CMF 11240017" 2. Refers to candidate: While not directly naming Marcel Ciolacu, it's promoting PSD's presidential campaign by mentioning "câștigăm primul tur al alegerilor prezidențiale" 3. Addresses wide population: Yes, it's a paid advertisement on Facebook/Instagram reaching 4000-4999 impressions 4. Electoral objective: Yes, explicitly mentions winning the first round of presidential elections 5. Journalism: No, this is clearly campaign material 6. Personal opinion: No, this is an organized campaign post with CMF number
The post combines both parliamentary and presidential election messaging, which is problematic since the presidential campaign period has ended. The mention of "câștigăm primul tur al alegerilor prezidențiale" is a direct reference to the presidential election.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Contains CMF number indicating official campaign material - Explicitly mentions winning presidential elections - Is a paid advertisement reaching thousands - Combines parliamentary campaign (still allowed) with presidential campaign (no longer allowed) - Has clear electoral objective for presidential race
conclusion.message-for-police: Infomed Pro SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mesaj de propaganda electorala pentru alegerile prezidentiale dupa incheierea perioadei legale, prin postarea cu ID 595398042978959 pe Facebook dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Mesajul "câștigăm primul tur al alegerilor prezidențiale" reprezinta propaganda electorala explicita pentru candidatul PSD la prezidentiale, fiind o reclama platita care a ajuns la 4000-4999 de persoane. Postarea include numarul CMF 11240017, confirmand natura sa de material electoral, si are un obiectiv electoral clar de influentare a votului pentru alegerile prezidentiale, incalcand astfel prevederile legale privind perioada de campanie electorala.
